table.name: vtiger_physicalareas
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_physicalareas` ( `physicalareasid` int(19) NOT NULL, `physicalareasname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `accounts` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`physicalareasid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_physicalareascf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_physicalareascf` ( `physicalareasid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`physicalareasid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
